refnamediv.refpurpose: Set/get configuration option value at runtime.

refsynopsisdiv.para: This operator is designed for internal use.

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Set/get configuration option value at runtime. Option value should be specified as string. If new value is not specified, then values of this configuration option at all instances are printed. If new value is specified, then value of option is updated at all instances and result array contains old and new values of the option at all instances.
